body:
i have a feeling that build time increased dramatically in recent weeks. I just built `gettext` and it took

```
==> Successfully installed gettext
  Fetch: 34.79s.  Build: 1h 15m 25.01s.  Total: 1h 15m 59.80s.
```

I don't recall it taking that much time last time. Among ~20 packages I build the worst was trilinos (on the order of 1 hour).

I will try other packages and compare it to my stable branch and update the post.
title: build time increased recently
